title: Nepal to Get New Constitution on September 20
content:
The new Constitution of the Himalayan nation -- under preparation since 2008 -- will now be officially promulgated by Nepal President Ram Baran Yadav at a special function. 
Kathmandu: Nepal was on today all set to bring out a new Constitution on September 20 with the Constituent Assembly (CA) having begun clause-by-clause voting on the much-awaited document. 
The CA has already started voting on each and every article of the new Constitution and as of today, the 601-member house had endorsed 37 articles of the proposed document.
